persona.name: Marcus Ellington
persona.role: Office manager at a 30-person accounting firm (existing Comcast Business customer)
persona.goal: Get routed correctly to handle an internet outage/slow speeds and find the support portal for troubleshooting.
persona.context: It’s mid-day during tax season and their connection is unstable, impacting VoIP calls and access to cloud accounting tools. He’s frustrated and wants immediate help, not a sales callback.
